title: Capture Me
description: Capture Me thrusts both Awaken Me fans and new readers alike right into the action—scenes filled with love, turmoil, bitterness and revenge. The second installment in the Connected Novel series Capture Me continues the story of Aimee, smart, beautiful young woman who has been forced into a world of warring vampires and werewolves.Escaping the vampires’ underground lair to head back to Palm Beach proved to be more challenging than Aimee and Marcus, her werewolf friend and bodyguard, could ever have imagined. Alec, still in love with Aimee, is on a rampage of hurt and turns to new friends to hide his heart, becoming the leader in a revolution that will change the way Vampires live. The fine line between right and wrong becomes very thin as Alec chooses to indulge his instinctual desires. When put to the test, can Aimee actually destroy Derek, the werewolf who kidnapped her and whom she still has feelings for? Decisions will be made, hearts will be broken, and a new breed will be created to face a force that will threaten to destroy the ultimate creation of Vampires and Werewolves alike.
author: E.M. Sky
